description: It's good app, but cannot support chinese input.
Its free, works well, easy to use, secure, cross platform, fun
summary: Works great in our office 5 users, cross platform ubuntu/windows

description: This is equal to plug and play, it is incredibly easy to use and has a massive compatibility range, even Rasbian has support!

Installed on three computers at home, two windows one ubuntu. Unlike all the others I've tried for transferring files, it installed without any trouble and just worked as advertised. File transfer speed is impressive as well. I don't expect to use the chat feature as I can shout at the wife over three metres.
Would simplify my life if I could run it on android phones and an ipad as well!!
sin internet, sin servidor, muy util para LAN
